text: Toseong Station () is a station of Busan Metro Line 1 in Toseong-dong, Seo District, Busan, South Korea. The station opened in 1988 as Toseongdong Station (토성동역) but was changed to its current name in 2010. ==External links== * Cyber station information from Busan Transportation Corporation Category:Busan Metro stations Category:Seo District, Busan Category:Railway stations opened in 1988 Category:1988 establishments in South Korea
title: Toseong station
